5938271_style_8: [REDACTED] to the bronchoscopy suite for evaluation of bilateral lung masses. We utilized general anesthesia and an 8.5 ETT. Upon inspection, a large mass was found blocking the RUL segments, which we sampled extensively. We then turned our attention to the left lung, using radial EBUS to locate a lesion in the LLL superior segment for additional sampling. A lavage was also done in this area. Bleeding was controlled, and the patient tolerated the procedure well.
